mapper.select: select customerno "customerno", loginname "loginname", registersource "registersource", membertype "membertype", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", email "email", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issave "issave", source "source", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", cormob "cormob" from cas.cust where customerno = #{customerno} for update

select customerno "customerno", loginname "loginname", registersource "registersource", membertype "membertype", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", email "email", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issave "issave", source "source", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", cormob "cormob" from cas.cust where customerno = #{customerno}

select customerno "customerno", loginname "loginname", registersource "registersource", membertype "membertype", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", linkmanname "linkmanname", mobile "mobile", cardno "cardno", bank "bank", companyname "companyname", email "email", status "status", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issave "issave", source "source", corname "corname", corcardtype "corcardtype", corcardno "corcardno", cormob "cormob" from cas.cust where customerno = #{customerno}
mapper.insert: insert into cas.cust( customerno,loginname,registersource,membertype,certificatetype, certificateno,linkmanname,mobile,cardno,bank, companyname,email,status,insertdate,inserttime, updatedate,updatetime,issave,source,corname, corcardtype,corcardno,cormob ) values( #{customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{loginname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{registersource, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{membertype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{linkmanname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{issave, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{source, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corcardtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{corcardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cormob, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into cas.cust( customerno,loginname,registersource,membertype,certificatetype, certificateno,linkmanname,mobile,cardno,bank, companyname,email,status,insertdate,inserttime, updatedate,updatetime,issave,source,corname, corcardtype,corcardno,cormob ) values
( #{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.loginname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.registersource, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.membertype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.linkmanname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.bank, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.companyname, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.issave, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.source, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.corname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.corcardtype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.corcardno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.cormob, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
